title: What is Amazon Rekognition?

metadata.description: Learn about What is Amazon Rekognition? with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Amazon Rekognition allows for performing multiple types of analysis on images.
Amazon Rekognition Introduction Video
.com is collaborating with Amazon Web Services to deliver digital training content to our students
What is Amazon Rekognition?
Amazon Rekognition is part of the artificial intelligence services provided by AWS.
You can load images at a push of a button or through the API.
Management of an Amazon Rekognition is automated. This means that Amazon will handle scaling of the application.
The key features of Rekognition are:
Object/Scene detection
Facial analysis
Face comparison
Facial recognition
Providing confidence score on the processed images.
Amazon Rekognition Pricing
Amazon Rekognition service is priced based on the type of usage.
There are three types of usage, each having two types of costs:
Analyzing images
Image Analysis
Face metadata storage
Analyzing videos
Video Analysis
Face metadata storage
Analysis with custom labels
Training Hours
Inference Hours

★
+1
